name: INTERNATIONAL SPECIAL NEEDS INSTITUTION TRUST (ISNI TRUST)
briefDescription: The International Special Needs Institution Trust is a social enterprise with a vision of empowering and enabling Women with Dis-Abilities to live a sustainable independent high quality life. To be a world class organization with an institutional infrastructure, which facilitates to improve and sustain the vocational training and employment services for women and Dis-Ables whose populace is in the third world countries.
